summary: Her name is Raven, she's an young Redguard Hunter/Archer.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Courier New][img]http://i.imgur.com/8yLVc7a.png[/img]


[color=#93c47d][size=4][u][i][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]

Name: Raven
Race: Redguard
Class: Hunter/Archer
Start level: 10 - 150
Weight: 100
Height: 1.00

She [b]CAN[/b] be married

[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Fighting Skills[/u][/color]

Archer
Onehanded
Light Armor
Sneak
[color=#d9ead3][u]
⇒ Where to find her[/u][/color]

Riverwood, Sleeping Giant


[color=#93c47d][size=4][u][i][b]FILE INFORMATION AND INSTALLATION[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Requiers[/u][/color]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Realistic Teeth only for RT version
[size=3][font=Courier New]
[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ File info[/u][/color]

Current Version: V2.0 SFW & NSFW - Realistic teeth long and short hair, SFW & NSFW - Non realistic Teeth long andf short hair
[/font][/size]
[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Installation[/u][/color]

With Nexus Mod Manager/MO or manually in your Skyrim/data Folder

[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Update[/u][/color]

Delete the old file then install the new Version

[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Knowing compatibilitylity[/u][/color]

xenius character enhancement
UFO
